name: Crunchy Chameleon【Free Games】
description:
A fun mini-game for adults and children alike! 

Control the chameleon skillfully and eat all the delicious fruits!

・ Game Contents 

　Time limit is 30 seconds. 

　Press the right key to move to the right.

　Press the left key to move left.

　Press the spacebar  to jump

　If you hit an enemy, it's game over. 

・Score by fruit 

　Cherry 1 points

　Pineapple 10 points 

　Banana 30 points 

　Watermelon 50 points

 Let's have fun competing with each other for the score!
